Class OfficerView

java.lang.Object
sg.edu.ntu.sc2002.ay2425.fcsdGroup2.views.OfficerView
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserView
public class OfficerView extends Object implements UserView
Represents the view for HDB Officers. Provides options for managing applicants, projects, flat bookings, generating receipts and reports, and handling enquiries.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the Officer Main Menu session. Displays a welcome message and repeatedly shows menu options until the officer chooses to exit.
      Specified by:
      start in interface UserView

      public void viewMyProjects(BTOProjsController projsController, HDBBTOExerciseController exerciseController)

      Parameters:
      projsController - the BTO projects controller
      exerciseController - the BTO exercises controller

      Returns:

    • handleFlatBookingByOfficer

      public void handleFlatBookingByOfficer()
      Handles the flat booking process for applicants. Includes listing successful applicants, selecting flats, booking, and updating records.
